I Am Hamzah The

I specialize in Graphic Design, UI/UX and Front End Development

View My Work

I Specialize In

Front End Development, Graphic Design and UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications

Concepting

I come up with excellent design concepts, filled with creativity and with great emphasis on details. Tools i use: Sketch

Front End Development

Im extremely adept at making fully responsive websites, and i specilize on the front-end development.
Languages : HTML, CSS, SASS, Javascript
Frameworks: React, Wordpress, Bootstrap

UI/UX

With 5 years of experience in UI/UX i make really simple and interactive designs, that are easy on the eye and the user journey is really easy for the clients to understand.
Tools I Use: Figma,Photoshp,Illustrator,XD,InDesign

Graphic Design

With 3 years of experience in Graphic Design i make interactive designs, logos, book covers that are easy on the eye and user friendly.
Tools I Use: Figma,Photoshp,Illustrator,XD,InDesign

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX,Development design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

I start with meeting up with the client and understanding their ideas, views and themes to get an understanding of what they want.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Then comes the second step where i use tools such as Sketch to come up with rough drafts that are as close to clients perception as possible.

3

UI/UX Designing

Next up i use tools like Figma, XD, InDesign, Illustrator and more to design the websites and do revisions according to clients comments.

4

Development

The last and final part if requested is called Development, i use different languages and frameworks to develop the front-end side of the websites.
